summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; accepting an easement from Noble Firs Limited, a limited partnership (Orville Cohen, General Partner), and Chambery Park, a limited partnership (Orville Cohen, General Partner) for a watermain and appurtenances, including a right of passage for installation, repair or reconstruction of the main and for provision, maintenance and administration of customer services dependent upon said main, in that area lying between the east margin of 15th Avenue Northeast and the west margin of 17th Avenue Northeast and platted as Northeast 140th in the plat of Paramount Park Addition.
